english.segment1: You're being tempted by the same ol'. You say it's under control. Just remind me how you see so clearly. Face down in a hole
english.segment2: Press toward the light. And the light will ground you. Go with the flow. And the flow will drown you. Hey now, there's always an out
english.segment3: But if you get up, get up, get up. You can breakaway. And if you get out, get out, get out. Nothing can overtake. Don't wait, escape
english.segment4: We get beaten by the same sticks. Until we start to crack. We get deceived by the same tricks. That's why the devil's bringing 'em back. (He's bringing 'em back)
english.segment5: Don't believe the hype. It's such a letdown.
